definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: forefinger, of priest, applying blood (P), Ex 29:12, Le 4:6, Le 4:17, Le 4:25 + 8 t.; applying oil Le 14:16, Le 14:16, Le 14:27.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: ´[[שְׁלַח א]] of any one Is 58:9, sign of contempt.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of God, as writing Ex 31:18 (E) De 9:10; = act of God Ex 8:15 (J).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: pl. of all the fingers 2Sa 21:20; fingers in gen. Is 2:8, Is 17:8, Is 59:3, Ps 144:1, Pr 7:3, Ct So 5:5; of ´[[י]] Ps 8:4; ´[[מׂרֶה בְא]] Pr 6:13 (of contempt. gesture); as measure of thickness, Je 52:21 four fingers.
toes: [[אֶחְבְּעׂת רַגְלָיו]] 2Sa 21:20 b, lit. fingers of his feet, cf. ´[[א]] ‖ 1Ch 20:6 = fingers and toes.
